trans-unit.source: Provides data for the events that render the background of objects derived from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 提供事件的資料，這些事件會呈現衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 類別中之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" /> 的物件背景。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs> class provides data for the following events:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs>類別提供下列事件的資料：

trans-unit.source: In addition, it provides data for the following methods:
trans-unit.target: 此外，它會提供資料的下列方法：

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderButtonBackground%2A> method to draw a border around a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderButtonBackground%2A>方法來繪製框線<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object used to draw the item.
trans-unit.target: 用來繪製項目的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs" /> class for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> and using the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.
trans-unit.target: 針對指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs" /> 並使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the graphics used to paint the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得繪製 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 所用的圖形。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to paint the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 繪製 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 所用的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderButtonBackground%2A> method to draw a border around a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderButtonBackground%2A>方法來繪製框線<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> to paint.
trans-unit.target: 取得要繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> to paint.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderButtonBackground%2A> method to draw a border around a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderButtonBackground%2A>方法來繪製框線<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Owner" /> property for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> to paint.
trans-unit.target: 取得要繪製之 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Owner" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> that is the owner of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 之擁有人的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> is in the overflow area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs.ToolStrip%2A> property returns an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>的溢位區域中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs.ToolStrip%2A>屬性會傳回空字串。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderButtonBackground%2A> method to draw a border around a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderButtonBackground%2A>方法來繪製框線<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>。

trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>類別。
